title: Add AnimationSpeed property to SKLottieView
body:
Adds `AnimationSpeed` property to control Lottie animation playback speed.

## Changes

- **Added `AnimationSpeed` bindable property** with default value `1.0`
- **Modified `Update()` method** to multiply `deltaTime` by speed factor before applying to progress
- **Added unit tests** covering speed variations (2x, 0.5x, 0, dynamic changes)

## Usage

```csharp
// XAML
<skia:SKLottieView Source="animation.json" AnimationSpeed="2.0" />

// C# - Dynamic control
lottieView.AnimationSpeed = 0.5;  // Slow motion
lottieView.AnimationSpeed = 2.0;  // Fast forward
lottieView.AnimationSpeed = 0;    // Pause
```

Speed multiplier applies to frame delta: `2.0` doubles playback rate, `0.5` halves it.

> [!WARNING]
>
